distractor_protocol.step: Distractor 1: Common misconception (e.g., 'Ignore it like non-critical' for critical extensions)
Distractor 2: Partial truth/reversal (e.g., 'Process only if recognized, else warn' instead of reject)
Distractor 3: Edge case confusion (e.g., 'Always reject regardless of criticality' or legacy behavior)
Ensure distractors are plausible based on voter-noted pitfalls like incomplete best practices or misclassified extensions
